s0102: Chong Er mother, Di Hu Shi woman.
s0103: Yi Wu mother, Chong Er mother younger sister.
s0104: Xian Gong sons eight people, crown prince Shen Sheng, Chong Er, Yi Wu all had worthy conduct.
s0105: And obtained Li Ji, then distanced these three sons.
s0106: Sixteenth year, Jin Xian Gong made two armies.
s0107: Gong led upper army, crown prince Shen Sheng led lower army, Zhao Shu drove chariot, Bi Wan as right, attacked extinguished Huo, extinguished Wei, extinguished Geng.
s0108: Returned, for crown prince walled Qu Wo, granted Zhao Shu Geng, granted Bi Wan Wei, to be grand master.
s0109: Shi Kui said: 'Crown prince not able establish.
s0110: Divided his capital city, positioned as minister, first made extreme for him, moreover able establish!
s0111: Not like flee, not make crime arrive.
s0112: Be Wu Tai Bo, not also able, still have good name.'
s0114: Bu Yan said: 'Bi Wan after must great.
s0117: With this begin reward, heaven opened it.
s0118: Heavenly son called myriad people, feudal lords called ten thousand people, now command great, with follow full number, its must have crowd.'
s0119: Initially, Bi Wan divined service at Jin country, met Tun compare Bi.
s0121: Tun solid Bi enter, auspicious what great.
s0124: Seventeenth year, Jin Hou sent crown prince Shen Sheng attack Dong Shan.
s0125: Li Ke advised Xian Gong said: 'Crown prince serves ancestral temple state altar millet offerings, to morning evening view lord meals, so called eldest son.
s0126: Lord travels then guards, has guard then follows, follows called strokes army, guards called oversees country, ancient system.
s0128: swear army travels, lord and state government's planned: not crown prince matters.
s0129: Troops in control commands only, receive commands then not awe, specialize commands then not filial, so lord successor fitting not able lead troops.
s0130: Lord loses his office, leads troops not awe, where use it?'
s0131: Gong said: 'I have sons, not know crown prince who establish.'
s0132: Li Ke not answered retired, saw crown prince.
s0135: Teach with army travels, not share this fear, why abolished?
s0136: Moreover son fear not filial, not fear not establish.
s0137: Cultivate self not blame people, then avoid difficulty.'
s0138: Crown prince led troops, Gong clothed him one-sided garment, belted gold jue.
s0139: Li Ke declined illness, not followed crown prince.
s0140: Crown prince then attacked Dong Shan.
s0141: Nineteenth year, Xian Gong said: 'Initially my previous lords Zhuang Bo, Wu Gong executed Jin disorder, Guo often assisted Jin attacked us, moreover hid Jin fled gong zi, indeed made disorder.
s0142: Not execute, later leave descendants worry.'
s0143: Then sent Xun Xi with Qu produce chariot borrowed road at Yu.
s0144: Yu borrowed road, then attacked Guo, took its Xia Yang returned.
s0145: Xian Gong privately told Li Ji said: 'I wish abolish crown prince, with Xi Qi replace him.'
s0146: Li Ji wept said: 'Crown prince establish, feudal lords all already know, often leads troops, hundred clans attach to him, why with lowly concubine reason abolish proper establish concubine?
s0147: Lord must do it, concubine suicide.'
s0148: Li Ji feigned praised crown prince, secretly sent people slandered harmed crown prince, wished establish her son.
s0149: Twenty-first year, Li Ji told crown prince said: 'Lord dreamed saw Qi Jiang, crown prince quickly sacrifice Qu Wo, return blessing to lord.'
s0150: Crown prince then sacrificed his mother Qi Jiang at Qu Wo, offered his sacrificial meat to Xian Gong.
s0151: Xian Gong at time out hunted, placed meat in palace.
